name: Bonnie L.
heading: As a mom of three, my days are nonstop chaos
text: As a mom of three, my days are nonstop chaos. Between work, kids, and managing a household, I barely had time to breathe, let alone focus on myself. Present Perfect has been a lifesaver. Within minutes, I felt my stress melting away, and after two weeks, I finally started to feel like myself again. It’s like meditation in a pill—no effort, just peace.
